hero.claim: UX Research Leadership with focus on Strategy, ResearchOps & Impact Measurement
hero.intro: I lead research teams, scale ResearchOps, and embed the user perspective into product strategy. My focus: accelerating decisions, proving impact, and building sustainable products.

about.title: About
about.text: UX Research leader with a background in econometrics and product development. I combine qual & quant to de-risk decisions and embed the user's voice into product strategy.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.valueProp: I help companies build sustainable products by transforming deep user insights into actionable strategies. My mission is to scale the user's voice and empower organizations to make user-centered decisions.

pillars.title: UX Strategy
pillars.caption: I align UX Research insights with business direction.

pillars.title: Strategic UX Research
pillars.caption: I translate real user needs into actionable product roadmaps.

pillars.title: ResearchOps
pillars.caption: I build efficient, scalable, and insight-driven research operations.

pillars.title: Leadership & Mentoring
pillars.caption: I empower teams through mentorship, alignment, and excellence in craft.

pillars.title: Impact Measurement
pillars.caption: I measure and communicate UX impact across the organization.

b2b2c.title: B2B2C Optimization
b2b2c.desc: Qual & quant insights aligned to business goals.

pricing.title: Pricing Usability Testing
pricing.desc: Clarity in pricing components and PDP details.

deleteCase.title: A micro interaction that saves lots of user time

atossReops.title: ReOps Implementation
atossReops.desc: Empowering UX teams through ResearchOps foundations.

craft.title: Craft
craft.text: Research as craft: repeatable, improvable practice with strong quality standards.
